-----Original Message-----
From: Kenji Fukasawa [mailto:kfukasawa@theplanet.com]

To: egreetsman@yahoo.co.uk
Cc: oma@omahamou.com; justin@enigmafilms.com; support@theplanet.com;
abuses@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [SUPPORT] Notice of Copyright

I am forwarding this to the appropriate department. Please forward any
further information, regarding copyright infringement, to
copyright@theplanet.com


Quickegreets Chris wrote:
> Notice of Copyright
>
> Mr C R Slater
> C/O 49A City Road
> Newcastle upon Tyne
> NE12AQ
> England
> 01912210338
>
> Sir, Madam,
>
> I am the author and copyright holder of the below poem illegally 
> displayed as shown on your Internet servers, this material has been on 
> my web site since 1998 ongoing and has been taken and reproduced by a 
> user or users with you.
>
> I write for three registered UK charities and they provide me with 
> free copyright on all my works, all poems are sold in booklet form to 
> raise income for charity.
>
> I swear on oath and as a committed Christian too (under penalty of 
> Federal and European prosecution for perjury that I do own the 
> copyright to the material designated below.
>
> Mr C R Slater
>
> 1.) the poem has been taken and used without my given consent for use 
> (data theft)
> 2.) Copyright and anti theft legal warnings have been ignored 
> infringed and breached
> 3.) the data thief has falsified the author information on your site 
> (plagiarism)
> 4.) my written work has been left with out any copyright warnings and 
> is open to abuse on your server
> 5.) As long as this work is displayed on servers without given author 
> consent your company and any hosting servers are liable for soliciting 
> traffic and potential interest to their service without given consent 
> to do as such.
>
> if you do a search in Yahoo or Google search you will see they are 
> taken from my own web site at the given URL's without consent to do so 
> and all IP addresses pages viewed are logged as recorded by the site 
> meter in use.
>
> These poems have clearly been taken by theft without authorisation.
>
> Not only are the poems copyright but are published.
> Please remove this poem as a matter of urgency. 
>
> I do not consent to my poems being displayed by any web site unless I 
> personally place them there, this ensures my work and web site is 
> always ever unique in it's own right.
>
> I write for three UK registered charities and we have already sued six 
> bogus poets for plagiarism and data theft on two particular poems. I 
> hope to hear from you on this as a matter of urgency.
>
> Poem displayed on your site is clearly marked on my own web site at 
> the locations given below and displayed at your site as shown in the 
> given location below.
>
> http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/family/mfdaughterb.htm
> http://www.quickegreets.com/javafree/family/mfdaughterb.htm
> http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/love/family/mfdaughterb.htm
> http://www.quickegreets.co.uk/javafree/family/mfdaughterb.htm
>
> CRS RC1998
> All Rights reserved
>
>
> and then posted as below on your server/web site
>
> http://www.omahamou.com/Happy%20Birthdayoma8104a.htm
>
> Many years in time long ago. The day, that God gave me you I got a 
> precious gift indeed, Blessed me many years through. But, the years 
> seem to pass so rapidly, For it seems as if, only yesterday, Your 
> little frame, was in my arms, Yet see how you've grown today. As you 
> journey ever through life, I wish, the very best for you, Life be 
> filled with joy and peace And countless dreams come true. Today you 
> may well have grown up, But in my heart, you will always be, My 
> special tiny little Baby Girl, The one, that God above gave to me.
>
> The Very Best, of my Blessings To guide Your path, all the way, Love 
> and Warmth to comfort you, From Sunrise too Sunset every day! I love 
> you!
>
> Love Mom
>
>
> Chris
